flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=23>>23 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 23 bags = <<48-23=25>>25 bags for $22 each
25 bags were sold for 25 bags x $22/bag = $<<25*22=550>>550
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $550 = $<<306+250+550=1106>>1106
The salesman made $1106 - $576 = $<<1106-576=530>>530 in profit.
#### 530

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 23. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
